MSG_REDESIGN_CONTENT: In early 2024, we’ll be starting to roll out a new and improved Citizen OS! Any questions, concerns, or to offer your help as a beta tester, contact Sara on support@citizenos.com
META_DEFAULT_TITLE: Citizen OS - електронна платформа прийняття рішень для громад.
META_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Citizen OS дозволяє спільне обговорення та голосування для різних груп, у разі коли всім учасникам неможливо зібратися одночасно в одному місці.
META_DEFAULT_KEYWORDS: е-прийняття рішень, електронне управління, е-демократія, демократія, пряма демократія, делегативна демократія

CREATE.DESC_DISCUSSION: Choose this if you want to encourage a discussion before potentially moving to voting and/or follow-up.

CREATE.DESC_VOTE: Choose this if you want to collect people’s votes before potentially moving to follow-up. No pro/con discussion available.

SEARCH.TITLE: Global search
SEARCH.DESC_START_SEARCH: You can search topics, groups and categories.
SEARCH.TXT_OOPS_NO_RESULTS: We couldn’t find any results matching your search :(
SEARCH.TXT_MAYBE_TYPO: Maybe there's a typo in your search?

TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_1_DESC: You can always create a new topic, start gathering ideas, propose a new voting or create a new group.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_2_DESC: The main menu serves as your main navigation through the platform. There are quick links to all your topics based on their current phase, i.e. discussion, idea gathering, etc.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_2_DESC2: You can also access different languages and support from here.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_3_DESC: New activity within a topic you’re involved in will be indicated here. You can open and close the activity feed whenever you want.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_3_DESC2: If there has been new activity since you last visited, the activity feed will be open by default.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_4_DESC: Looking for a topic or a group? Search for it here.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_4_DESC2: The search is aware of whether you are in a topic or not. If you’re not, it will search across the platform.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_4_DESC3: If you’re in a topic, it will only search within that topic.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_5_DESC: As you're not yet active in any topics, we’ve populated this space with popular public topics.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_5_DESC2: Once you've participated in or created topics, they will show up here.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_6_DESC: Groups are a collective of people that have something in common. For example, members could be part of the same organisation or community. Or have similar interests or goals.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_2_LBL_DASHBOARD_DE: This is your central hub and portal to all parts of the platform - create, browse, engage, and more.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_2_LBL_MY_TOPICS_DE: Here you can find the topics you created or are involved in.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_2_LBL_MY_GROUPS_DE: Here you can find the groups you started or are a member of.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_2_LBL_ACTIVITY_FEE: New activity on your topics and groups will be shown here.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_3_DESC: The top menu is always accessible for navigation, and topic or group creation. Quickly find pages like Dashboard, My Topics, My Groups, Public Topics and Public Groups.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC: Your topic can have different phases.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_DISCUSSION: In this phase, the main idea is to hold a constructive discussion using pro and con arguments.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_IDEATION: A topic can have an ideation phase, in which anyone can share their ideas on how to tackle the issue at hand.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_VOTE: When there’s a need for a clear representation of where participants lean, you can hold a vote.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_FOLLOW_UP: After a decision has been made, the follow-up phase offers a way to keep participants up-to-date with the next steps.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC: In each topic you can perform specific actions.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_SEARCH: Find anything within the topic itself and quickly jump to that keyword.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_ACTIVITY_FEED: Check out what happened while you were away with the topic's activity feed.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_FAVOURITE: Add or remove this topic to or from your favourites.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_MORE: If you need to edit, invite a co-creator or close a topic, this is the place.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_3_DESC: This houses all the relevant topic info you might need. Is it public or private? Who published it and when?
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_3_DESC2: Here you can see the social media hashtag used. Clicking on it reveals the social media mentions.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_3_DESC3: Finally, categories define the topic more precisely.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_4_DESC: Here you can see how many participants are in this topic. You can also manage them from here and invite more people.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_5_DESC: As we mentioned before, a topic can consist of several phases. This is where you can add another phase.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_6_DESC: Topic text is the basis for the discussion and/or voting. The main information will be shared here.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_6_DESC2: By default, we will keep this collapsed, but you can expand it at any time to read the entire text.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_7_DESC: The main discussion will take place here. Anyone can post a pro or con argument, or provide some additional information.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_7_DESC2: Other participants can agree or disagree with arguments, and post replies or reactions.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC: A topic can hold a lot of information. Since this is a small screen, we've organised it to have better focus.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_DOCUMENT: The topic’s text and info are accessible from here.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_DISCUSSION: This is where the discussion takes place, using pro and con arguments.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_IDEATION: A topic can have an ideation phase, in which anyone can share their ideas on how to tackle the issue at hand.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_VOTE: When there’s a need for a clear representation of where participants lean, you can hold a vote.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_FOLLOW_UP: After a decision has been made, the follow-up phase offers a way to keep participants up-to-date with the next steps.

MODALS.TOPIC_INVITE_VIEW_HEADING_AFTER_JOIN: What you can do once you join a topic
MODALS.TOPIC_INVITE_VIEW_AFTER_JOIN_ITEM_2: Receive notifications of activity within the topic
MODALS.TOPIC_INVITE_VIEW_LNK_LEARN_MORE: Дізнатися більше про Citizen OS, якщо ви тут вперше!
MODALS.LANGUAGES_MODAL_HELP_US_TRANSLATE: Your language missing? Help us translate!
MODALS.WIDGETS_HOW_DOES_IT_WORK_TEXT: Ви можете прийняти участь у дискусії, додавши Ваші аргументи
MODALS.PRIVACY_POLICY_DESCRIPTION: Ми змінили наші Умови використання та Політику конфіденційності. Будь ласка, перегляньте їх уважно та погодьтеся або не погодьтеся з ними. Не погодившись на наші умови, ви не зможете використовувати нашу платформу, ваша сесія завершиться, ви повернетеся на домашню сторінку, а дію вашого облікового запису буде припинено.
MODALS.USER_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_YOU_SURE: Ви впевнені, що хочете видалити свій обліковий запис?
MODALS.USER_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_NO_UNDO: Будь ласка, майте на увазі, що ви не зможете скасувати цю дію.
MODALS.USER_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_KEEP_DATA_ANONYM: Усі дані, створені користувачем, будуть анонімізовані, і їх буде неможливо відновити
MODALS.DUPLICATE_TOPIC_CONFIRM_HEADING: Ви дійсно бажаєте дублювати цю тему?
MODALS.DUPLICATE_TOPIC_CONFIRM_HEADING_DESCRIPT: З'явиться нова приватна тема зі статусом "створюється"
MODALS.DUPLICATE_TOPIC_CONFIRM_TXT_COPY_TOPIC_C: topic content as it is right now (including images, footnotes, comments)
MODALS.ADD_EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Надайте вашу електронну адресу, щоб отримувати запрошення та відповідні повідомлення.
MODALS.ADD_EMAIL_TXT_VERIFY: Важливо: одразу після авторизації ви отримаєте електронний лист з метою перевірки вашої електронної адреси. Не забудьте пройти перевірку, щоб завершити реєстрацію!
MODALS.ADD_EID_HEADING: Зв’язати ваш обліковий запис із власним eID?
MODALS.ADD_EID_DESCRIPTION: А ви знали, що можете синхронізувати ваш обліковий запис із власним eID? Для цього натисніть кнопку нижче або продовжуйте без синхронізації (ви можете це зробити пізніше у налаштуваннях свого облікового запису).
MODALS.USER_CONNECTION_REMOVE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_Y: Ви впевнені, що хочете видалити підключення до {{connection}}?
MODALS.TOPIC_NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS_TITLE_DESCRI: Налаштування застосовуються тільки для цієї теми {{topicTitle}}
MODALS.TOPIC_NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS_LBL_TOPIC_UP: Topic updates (content, status, categories, moderation, etc.)
MODALS.REMOVE_TOPIC_NOTIFICATIONS_CONFIRM_ARE_Y: Ви впевнені, що хочете вимкнути сповіщення для цієї теми?
MODALS.REMOVE_TOPIC_NOTIFICATIONS_CONFIRM_YES: Так, вимкнути сповіщення для цієї теми
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_DESC: Приєднуючись до цієї групи, ви погоджуєтеся з наступним:
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_POINT1: Your username is included in the group members list, publicly visible to all group members
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_POINT2: You, like other members, will only have reading rights.
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_POINT3: Group activity is displayed under the "My activity" feed
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_HEADING: Ми хотіли би дізнатися про вас більше
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_DESC: Вітаємо! Ми дуже раді познайомитися з нашими користувачами й дізнатися, для чого ви використовуєте нашу платформу. Раді поділитися? Це допоможе оцінити наш вплив і зробити платформу відповіднішою до ваших потреб.
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_QUESTION_1: Для чого ви використовуєте Citizen OS?
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_QUESTION_2: Чи можна зв’язатися з вами, щоб дізнатися більше? (На це не піде багато часу, обіцяємо).
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_LBL_CHECKBOX: Так, я не проти, щоб зі мною зв’язався представник Citizen OS.
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_BE_CAREFULL: P.S! Завжди будьте уважні щодо даних, якими ви ділитеся.
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_BE_GDPR: Після того, як ви надішлете відповідь, Citizen OS збиратиме та оброблятиме ваші персональні дані, щоб розуміти потреби користувачів, та зв’яжеться з користувачами, що надали згоду, згідно з відповідними й застосовними законодавчими актами щодо захисту персональних даних, включаючи GDPR.
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_BE_VIEW_MORE_LEGAL: Аби дізнатися більше, прочитайте нашу Політику конфіденційності
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_TEXT_THANK_YOU: Thank you so much for sharing with us. If you agreed to chat more, we'll be in touch soon! For any queries or feedback in the future, please submit a Help Request or User Feedback via our Help Centre.
MODALS.INTERRUPT_ARE_YOU_SURE: Doing this will interrupt your current process. Are you sure you want to proceed?

HOME.STATS_DESCRIPTION: Make smarter, more impactful decisions based on respectful discussions on our free, open-source participation platform.
HOME.FEATURE_DISCUSSION_ITEM_1: Create and co-edit a topic text
HOME.FEATURE_DISCUSSION_ITEM_3: Participants can discuss using pro/con arguments
HOME.FEATURE_DISCUSSION_ITEM_4: Argument popularity can be measured via 'likes'
HOME.FEATURE_DISCUSSION_FOOTER_INFO: After the discussion you can move the topic into voting and/or follow-up.
HOME.FEATURE_IDEATION_ITEM_1: Create and co-edit a topic text
HOME.FEATURE_IDEATION_ITEM_3: Participants can share ideas and comment on each other's

HOME.FEATURE_VOTING_FOOTER_INFO: After collecting votes you can move the topic into follow-up.
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_HEADING: Groups – harnessing the power of the people
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_DESC_ITEM_1: Invite people into a group to give them easy access to relevant topics
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_DESC_ITEM_2: Join a public or private group that deals with topics of your interest
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_DESC_ITEM_3: Enjoy quicker sharing or unsharing of topics, a group space containing all topics shared to those users, and easier rights administration.
HOME.HEADING_WELCOME: Hi there, welcome to Citizen OS!
HOME.PUBLIC_GROUPS_DESCRIPTION: Have a sneak peek at some of the most recent public groups currently available on Citizen OS.
HOME.PUBLIC_TOPICS_DESCRIPTION: Have a sneak peek at some of the most recent public topics currently available on Citizen OS.
HOME.MISSION_BOX_DESC: To empower as many people as possible to participate in respectful, meaningful discussions. We aim to facilitate collective decisions on issues that directly affect people’s wellbeing.

HOME.TXT_BEGINNERS_GUIDE: Вітаємо, ласкаво просимо до Citizen OS! Прочитайте цю тему, щоб дізнатися як платформа працює.
HOME.TXT_KEEP_IT_CLEAN_PLAN: Keep It Clean Plan by Let's Do It! World.
HOME.TXT_DESCRIPTION_KEEP_IT_CLEAN_PLAN: Тут ви можете знайти усі документи та інформацію про план Keep It Clean.
HOME.TXT_DESCRIPTION_HACKTIVIST_COMMUNITY: Громадянська хактивістська спільнота - це простір для зустрічі людей, які виступають за електронну демократію та спільне прийняття рішень.
HOME.TXT_CITIZENOS_COMMUNITY: Обговорення е-демократїі з командою Citizen OS
HOME.TXT_CITIZENOS_COMMUNITY_DESCRIPTION: Приєднуйтесь до нас у розробці нашої платформи та обговоренні е-демократії.

GROUP_CREATE.HEADING: Create a group
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_INPUT_NAME_DESC: Use a name that’s understandable and logical.

GROUP_CREATE.NOTIFICATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Congratulations! Keep in mind you can always manage the group via the group actions menu.

PUBLIC_GROUP.HEADING_DESCRIPTION: Здається, що в цій групі ще немає тем.

REGISTER.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION: Wondering what the catch is? There isn't one! We're a non-profit with a mission to empower as many people as possible to participate in respectful, meaningful discussions on the issues that matter to them. We run off donations and grants from long-term funders – which means no fees, no sale of your data, no strings attached!
REGISTER.TOOLTIP_LNK_ABOUT: Read more on our About page

TOPIC_CREATE.HEADING: Create a topic
TOPIC_CREATE.SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_DESC: Set whether your topic is visible to anyone, or only by invitation.
TOPIC_CREATE.SETTINGS_ADD_TO_GROUP_DESC: You can already add this topic to a group for which you have admin rights. You can also do this later.
TOPIC_CREATE.PREVIEW_INFO: You can edit your topic text now or later (but not after voting has started).
TOPIC_CREATE.WRITE_TOGETHER_DESC: Collaborate on the topic text by inviting co-creators.
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Creating a discussion topic allows the participants to use pro & con arguments, which can help you shape the next phases of the topic.
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_NEXT_DESCRIPTION: What can you do when the topic is published?
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_IDEATION: Add ideation to start gathering ideas
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_VOTING: Add voting to start collecting votes
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_FOLLOW_UP: Add follow-up to keep participants up to date on any progress made.
TOPIC_CREATE.NOTIFICATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Congratulations on your new topic! Now it’s time to get people engaged. Invite participants below or you can also invite them later.

TOPIC_EDIT.HEADING: Edit topic
TOPIC_EDIT.NOTIFICATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: You have successfully updated your topic!

TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TITLE_DRAW: Схоже, що ваше голосування закінчилося нічиєю.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_DRAW_DESCRIPTION: Sometimes having several winning options is a good thing, but there are times when you really just need one clear winner.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TITLE_DRAW_WHAT_NOW: Ось що ви можете зараз зробити:
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_DRAW_WHAT_NOW: It might be possible to solve this offline - for example, a co-located team could flip a coin between the two winning options. Also, if you had votes going to non-winning options, we suggest you run another vote between the two winning options only. This time, you could pre-determine a tie-breaker in case you have another draw: a coin flip, a default winning option (usually status quo wins in a draw), a person whose vote is decisive, etc.
TOPICS_TOPICID.DESCRIPTION_REPORTED: Since you’re a moderator of this topic, there are several actions you can take:
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_LNK_MODERATE: Hide this topic if you agree with why it was reported
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_LNK_RESOLVE: Mark as resolved if the topic (again) conforms to the Citizen OS Rules of Conduct
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: This vote requires an ID-card or Mobiil-ID signature.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: This vote needs to be signed with an ID-card or Mobiil-ID to be registered. You cannot vote without identifying yourself.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_REGISTERED: Thank you for your vote. You can still change your vote at any time before the voting closes.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED: To download voting results, select a suitable format below. Our "human-readable" container comes with an additional spreadsheet file (.csv, comma-separated table) containing data for each individual vote, as required by Riigikogu and local governments. For systems that can't process such info (such as Äriregister) please select "machine-readable" file.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED_EXPIRED: Голосування було проведено. Будь ласка, відправте наступну тему, а потім поверніться сюди для завантаження результатів голосування.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_AUTH_HARD_ID_EXPLANATION: Потрібен підпис ID-Card, Mobiil-ID або Smart-ID
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_DELEGATION_EXPLANATION: Дозволити користувачам передавати своє право голосу.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_NOTICE_DELEGATION_DISABLED_FOR_: Коли е-ID обрано в якості методу голосування, делегування права голосувати неможливе.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_STEP4_DESCRIPTION: You can choose either a deadline or vote amount, or combine them. When you combine them, the first that is reached will end voting.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_VOTE_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Define the end of the voting system based on the amount of votes counted. You can only choose one.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_MINIMUM_VOTES_DESCRIPTION: Кількість голосів, що необхідна для успішного завершення.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_ALL_VOTES_ARE_IN_EXPLANATION: When every user in the topic has voted, the voting system closes.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_SET_VOTE_REMINDER_EXPLANATION: You can set an automatic reminder email for users a few days before the end of the voting
TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_YOU_CAN_CHOOSE_OPTIONS: This is a multiple selection voting. You can choose max {{maxChoices}} options that align with your view.
TOPICS_TOPICID.MSG_CHOOSE_AT_LEAST_OPTIONS: Мінімально вам потрібно обрати стільки опцій: {{optionsCount}}
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_DESCRIPTION_CHOICE_RANGE: Define the max amount of choices a person can vote for. For example, you have 4 choices but you allow people to choose up to 2 out of them. You can only add as many as you have choices to choose from.
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_CREATOR_REMOVED_ARGUMENT: This argument was removed by argument creator
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_READ_CODE_OF_CONDUCT: Прочитайте наші правила поведінки для додаткової інформації
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_P: Використовуйте цей варіант, якщо ви погоджуєтеся та хочете залишити аргумент на підтримку або на користь цієї теми.
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_C: Використовуйте цей варіант, якщо ви не погоджуєтеся та хочете залишити аргумент, який не підтримує цю тему.
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_P: Використовуйте цей варіант, якщо ви хочете про щось коротко заявити або прокоментувати, поставити запитання або отримати пояснення щодо теми.
TOPICS_TOPICID.PLACEHOLDER_EXPLAIN_YOUR_ARGUMENT: Поясніть та доведіть Ваше твердження тут...
TOPICS_TOPICID.LOG_IN_TO_PARTICIPATE: You need to log in to participate.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_METIONS_TXT_NO_HASHTAG_DEFINE: Sorry, we cannot show social mentions as there is no hashtag linked to this topic. Topic admins can add the hashtag to pull in social mentions.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_MENTIONS_NO_MENTIONS_FOUND: Sorry, no social mentions found on X for the hashtag
TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_QR_CODE_FOOTER_SCAN_CODE: Перейдіть прямо в тему {{topicTitle}}, просканувавши цей QR-код!
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_VOTING_HEADING: There is no voting system yet
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_VOTING_DESC_BEFORE: By adding a voting system to your topic, you have a final opportunity to find out what participants think of it. You can set up different types of voting, depending on your needs.
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_VOTING_DESC_AFTER: After voting has finished, you can download the results files to take the decision forward.
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_FOLLOW_UP_HEADING: There is no follow-up system yet
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_FOLLOW_DESC_BEFORE: Follow-up is the last phase of a topic. After a decision has been made, it's important to keep participants up to date with the next steps.
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_FOLLOW_DESC_AFTER: Describe, what will happen as a result of the made decisions, adding details of any progress or outcomes.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TUTORIAL_DESC: We've made big improvements to the way topics work! Got a minute? We’d love to guide you through the changes.

401.DESCRIPTION_INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS: If you've received an invite to the topic or group you're trying to access, you need to accept it first. Please check your activity feed or email.
401.HEADING_YOU_MAY_RECOVER: Here are two ways to resolve this:

ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_ADD_USER_TOPIC: Користувач {{userName}} запросив користувача {{userName2}} взяти участь у темі {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_ADD_USER_TOPIC_ACTIVITYGRO: Користувач {{userName}} та {{groupCount}} інших запросили користувачів прийняти участь у темі {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_ADD_USER_TOPIC_USERACTIVIT: Користувач {{userName}} запросив стільки користувачів до участі в темі {{topicTitle}}: {{groupCount}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_ACCEPT_INVITE_TOPIC_ACTIVI: Користувач {{userName}} та {{groupCount}} інших прийняли запрошення до теми {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICMEMBERUSER: Користувач {{userName}} змінив рівень доступу користувача {{userName2}} до теми {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICMEMBERUSER_ACT: Користувач {{userName}} та {{groupCount}} інших змінили рівень доступу користувачів до теми {{topicTitle}}.
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICMEMBERUSER_USE: Користувач {{userName}} змінив рівень доступу до теми {{topicTitle}} для стількох користувачів: {{groupCount}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICMEMBERUSER_NON: Користувач {{userName}} відкликав доступ користувача {{userName2}} до теми {{topicTitle}}
Користувач {{userName}} та {{groupCount}} інших відкликали доступ користувачів до теми {{topicTitle}}
Користувач {{userName}} скасував доступ стількох користувачів до теми {{topicTitle}}: {{groupCount}}
